name: Handmade Glass Lampwork RED Heart focal bead set
description:
Handmade Glass Lamp work 
Red Heart focal bead set 


The heart is handmade with morretti(effetre) glass by myself, 
Dollie Mixture


The heart is made with red glass 

This is a Puffed Heart it is NOT FLAT

The Heart is:
Height 18mm 
Width 17mm
Depth 11mm 

The heart has a 2.4mm hole running vertical, from top to bottom





The heart is not supplied with a head pin
If you e-mail me, I can add a head pin complete with a hanging loop at no extra cost 
Then all you need to do is add the Heart to a chain, wire or leather cord etc to make a pendant necklace of your own choice


The heart is complete with 6 matching red round beads
The beads are:
Height 9mm
Width 9mm
They have 1.6mm stringing hole

Thank you for taking the time to visit



Please see my other Beadie Babies and beads 
e bay uk.dollie_mixture
Please visit again as I will be adding more handmade lampwork beads and Beadie Babies in the future
